description:
In this episode, the small shows the biggest bravery, and old man’s accidental gift is repaid, and the lazy man gets the cow.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Issunboushi / Omusubi Kororin / Ushi no Yomeiri
Little One Inch / The Rolling Rice Ball / The Cow`s Marriage
一寸法師 / おむすびころりん / 牛の嫁入り
